basic.description: Igneous petrology, geochemistry and fluid-rock interaction applied to metallogeny and ore genesis. Case studies in mineral chemistry and geochemstry. Lectures, critical reading, laboratory work and seminars will provide an advanced understanding of the major ore-forming processes in a geodynamic setting and applications to mineral exploration.
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Advanced Petrogenesis and Metallogenesis

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite      GEOL362 and GEOL365 or permission of the DEPT.
